asciimath_expressions.three_point_vertex: V^{abc}_{mu nu rho}(p,q,r) = f^{abc} [eta_{mu nu}(q-r)_rho + eta_{nu rho}(r-p)_mu + eta_{rho mu}(p-q)_nu] prod_{i=1}^3 F(|p_i|)
asciimath_expressions.four_point_vertex: V^{abcd}_{mu nu rho sigma} = [color_structure] [eta_{mu nu} eta_{rho sigma} + eta_{mu rho} eta_{nu sigma} + eta_{mu sigma} eta_{nu rho}] prod_{i=1}^4 F(|p_i|)
